dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
Medical App
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
medicalai
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
LaunchScreen
Main
This app requires camera access to capture photos for medical records and video consultations.
This app requires microphone access for voice recordings and video consultations with doctors.
This app requires photo library access to upload medical images and documents.
This app requires permission to save medical images and documents to your photo library.
This app requires location access to find nearby medical facilities and doctors.
This app requires location access to find nearby medical facilities and provide location-based health services.
This app requires background location access for emergency medical services and health monitoring.
This app requires Bluetooth access to connect to medical devices and health monitoring equipment.
This app requires Bluetooth access to communicate with medical peripherals and health devices.
This app requires contacts access to add emergency contacts and share medical information with family members.
This app requires calendar access to schedule and manage medical appointments.
This app uses Face ID to securely authenticate and protect your medical data.
This app requires access to read your health data to provide personalized medical insights and track your health progress.
This app requires permission to write health data to keep your medical records synchronized.
This app uses speech recognition for voice commands and medical note dictation.
This app requires motion data access to track physical activity and health metrics.
This app uses Siri to help you quickly access medical information and schedule appointments.
This app may access your media library for therapeutic music recommendations.
Editor
